import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'reactstrap'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, FormGroup, InputGroup, HTMLTable } from '@blueprintjs/core'; import EmployeeRoleOptions from '../../Selects/EmployeeRoleOptions'; import SupportTypeOptions from '../../Selects/SupportTypeOptions'; import LanguageOptions from '../../Selects/LanguageOptions'; import ProjectOptions from '../../Selects/ProjectOptions'; import RMOptions from '../../Selects/RMOptions'; export default class CreateEmployeeForm extends Component { render() { const { onChange, onSubmit, onClear, sap, name, email, role, supportType, project, mainlanguage, rm } = this.props; return (
); } } CreateEmployeeForm.defaultProps = { addButtonCaption: 'Add' };
